Name: Golden Star Balm
Description: Famous Vietnamese Golden Star Balm, also known as Cao Sao Vang is made from essential oils like Camphor, Menthol, Peppermint, Cajuput. Balm for external use: a small amount of it is applied to the sub-district and rubbing of the skin: for headache - the temples and the nape of the neck, with a cold - under the nostrils, the common cold - in the chest, back, abdomen, insect bites - on the place of bite. Precautions and special instructions: Intended for external use only.
